mn91:8.10: tādisova → tādisova bho (bj) | tādiso ca kho (s1-3, km, mr) | tādiso ca bho (pts1)
mn91:8.11: Samannāgato ca so → samannāgato ca so bho (bj) | samannāgato ca bho so (s1-3, pts1)
mn91:22.4: avijahitattā → avijahantā bhāvena (bj, s1-3, km) | avija­hattā­bhāvena (pts1)
mn91:28.3: oramiya → atha naṃ (bj) | oramattha (s1-3, km, pts1) | oramati (mr)
mn91:29.15: kacci jivhā na dassakā → kacci jivhā na rassikā. (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
